item.query: select * from (select * from (select 'index.php?CODPAT='||c.CODPAT||'&VISITNUM='||c.VISITNUM||'&ESAM='||c.ESAM||'&VISITNUM_PROGR='||c.VISITNUM_PROGR||'&PROGR='||c.PROGR as LINK, '[ESAM_NAME('||c.VISITNUM||','||c.ESAM||')] - Patient Code: '||c.CODPAT as MESSAGE, greatest(c.INSERTDT, nvl(c.MODDT,to_date('01010001','DDMMYYYY'))) as DT, case when FINE is null then 'check-square-o' else 'pencil' end as ICON from [PREFIX]_COORDINATE c, [PREFIX]_REGISTRAZIONE r where r.CODPAT=c.CODPAT and r.CENTER in (select uc.center from [PREFIX]_UTENTI_CENTRI uc where uc.userid=:userid) and INIZIO is not null --CODPAT_WHERE-- UNION ALL select 'index.php?&exams=visite_exam.xml&CODPAT='||c.CODPAT||'&CENTER='||c.CENTER||'&ESAM='||c.ESAM||'&VISITNUM='||c.VISITNUM||'&PROGR='||c.PROGR||'&VISITNUM_PROGR='||C.VISITNUM_PROGR||'&ABILITA_EQ_DE=1' as LINK, case when CHIUSA is not null then 'eQuery '||c.id||' closed' when VALIDATA is not null then 'eQuery '||c.id||' validated' when ANSWER is not null then 'eQuery '||c.id||' answered' else 'eQuery '||c.id||' opened' end as MESSAGE, greatest(c.QUEST_DT, nvl(c.ANS_DT,to_date('01010001','DDMMYYYY')), nvl(c.VAL_DT,to_date('01010001','DDMMYYYY')), nvl(c.CHIUSA_DT,to_date('01010001','DDMMYYYY'))) as DT, case when CHIUSA is not null then 'lock' when VALIDATA is not null then 'check' when ANSWER is not null then 'reply' else 'comment' end as ICON from [PREFIX]_EQUERY c where c.CENTER in (select uc.center from [PREFIX]_UTENTI_CENTRI uc where uc.userid=:userid) --CODPAT_WHERE-- ) t order by t.dt desc) where rownum < 10
